timeline.bodyText:
Why is this mapper needed ?
I also may have seen ForbiddenException and/or UnauthorizedException thrown on some JAX-RS paths too
timeline.author: sberyozkin

replies.bodyText:
This is needed because if you use the @RolesAllowed interceptor with a deferred identity you may get this exception when resolving the deferred identity. This mapper will handle it correctly.
By default the deferred identity will automatically handle this on a vert.x level, however we have to disable this for JAX-RS as you get an error if the vert.x response is closed while the JAX-RS request is ongoing.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
